mobileResponsivenessTip: Ensure that all interactive elements are touch-friendly and spaced out more on smaller screens.
loadingSpeedTip: Optimize images and implement lazy loading to improve initial page load time.
seoOptimizationTip: Improve meta descriptions and use header tags appropriately for better search engine visibility.
userExperienceTip: Simplify the navigation menu for quicker access to key sections of the site.
bookingFlowTip: Streamline the booking process by reducing the number of steps or forms for faster reservations.
tips: Optimize images for faster loading times.
Improve alt text for all images to enhance SEO.
Ensure consistent and clear calls-to-action across the website.
whatThisWebsiteDoesInOneLine: We found that your website is dedicated to promoting and booking stays at Pendry Manhattan West, a luxury hotel in New York City.
